data.name: CreateWorldForm.Goals.Field.Description.Text
data.value: Write a description for this learning world to give a overview of the content that will be covered.

data.name: CreateWorldForm.Goals.Field.Goals.Text
data.value: Define learning outcomes that precisely describe the verifiable skills or knowledge that should be acquired upon completion of the learning world.

data.name: CreateWorldForm.General.Field.EnrolmentKey.Text
data.value: Enter an enrollment key to restrict access to this learning world.

data.name: CreateWorldForm.EnrolmentKey.Tooltip
data.value:
An enrollment key enables access to the learning world to be restricted to only those who know the key.

If the field is left blank, any user may enrol in the learning world.

If an enrolment key is specified, any user attempting to enrol in the learning world will be restricted to supply the key. Note that users only need to supply the enrolment key once, when they enrol in the learning world.

data.name: CreateWorldForm.Fields.Collapsable.Story.Field.Description.Text
data.value: Formulate an introduction and a conclusion for your story here in order to embed the learning world in a framework.

data.name: CreateWorldForm.Theme.Field.Theme.Text
data.value: Select one of the various themes for the learning world.

data.name: CreateWorldForm.Finalization.Text
data.value: Link to the Learning World Finalisation

data.name: CreateWorldForm.Finalization.Collapsable.Description.Text
data.value: Provide a link to a online survey or your university Moodle, and also formulate a reference text.

data.name: CreateWorldForm.Finalization.Tooltip
data.value: If no link or note text is specified, the placeholder text in the note text field is displayed in the 3D learning environment by default.

data.name: CreateWorldForm.Finalization.Field.EvaluationLinkText.Placeholder.Text
data.value: You have successfully completed all the learning spaces and thus passed the learning world, congratulations!

data.name: CreateWorldForm.General.InfoText
data.value: Provide general information about this learning world.

data.name: CreateWorldForm.Goals.Field.Description.Placeholder
data.value: This learning world covers the following topic: ...

data.name: EditElementForm.Fields.Collapsable.Goals.AdaptivityElement.Text
data.value: Define learning outcomes that precisely describe the verifiable skills or knowledge that should be acquired upon completion of the adaptivity element.
